install.name: Search - Sobiprosearch
install.author: Joomla! Project
install.description: Allows Searching of Content Section information from sobipro

param.name: search_limit
param.label: Search Limit
param.description: Number of Search items to return

param.name: search_field
param.label: Fields to search
param.description: Field ids of fields to search

param.name: menu_itemid
param.label: Menu Item Id
param.description: Menu Item Identification to set a results page context
